name: Rune of Spelleating (Temporary)
description: Activate this Rune to immediately end any persistent spell within 12 yards. Additionally, if Runesmith is holding this item, he can instead attempt to Dispel any incoming spell and gains +20 modifier to that attempt. If you succeed, the opposing caster canâ€™t use that spell again within the next 24 hours. Activating this rune takes an Action.
